select_offer_details: Let us know more about your shopping habits so that we can offer a better cashback rate.
confirm_select_offer_details: Once you shop in these {number_of_brands} brands, you will earn cash back.
please_select_brands: Please select {number_of_brands} brands you shop the most.
please_confirm_brands: If you’re happy with the offer, please confirm your choice.
edit_prefernece_afterward: You can edit the preference in settings afterward
let_us_know: LET’S US KNOW MORE ABOUT YOU
dont_worry: Don’t worry. We only detect email receipts, not your personal emails.
we_hope_to_provide: We hope to provide better in-app experience and tailor more offers and redeem options in the future.
claim_gift_on_birthday: You can claim gift on your birthday
login_in_agree_terms_and_policy: By logging in your email address, you agree with MailTime’s Terms and Service and Privacy Policy.
it_might_take_some_time: It might take some time, we will notify you once it’s done.
turn_on_notifications_to_learn: Turn on notifications to learn more about the latest missions.
